text: Eva Marcille joined The Real Housewives Of Atlanta on Sunday's episode and didn't wait long to drop a bombshell. In her debut as a'friend'on the show the America's Next Top Model winner told Cynthia Bailey the man she has been dating for two months already has a girlfriend. Will Jones, 41, has been courting Cynthia with talk of settling down.
